alert.note: Alert for Coconino; Navajo (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 28 at 7:42PM MST until July 28 at 8:30PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM MST THIS EVENING FOR COCONINO AND NAVAJO COUNTIES... At 737 PM MST, Doppler radar indicated that thunderstorms across the area were dissipating. Earlier this evening thunderstorms produced between 1.5 and 2.5 inches of rain. HAZARD...Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Seba Dalkai, Tees Toh, Cedar Springs, Dilkon, Castle Butte, Hopi Reservation and Navajo Reservation. This includes the following highways... State Route 87 between mile markers 371 and 391. This includes the following creeks, washes and rivers... Ha-whi-yalin Wash, Tees Toh Wash, Jeddito Wash and Coyote Wash. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Flooding of washes and creeks will occur, some dirt roads will become muddy and impassable. Paved roads and underpasses could become flooded as well.
